results.name: a(1) = 1, a(n) = -mu(n) for n >= 2.
comment: Apparently the Dirichlet inverse of A114006. [_R. J. Mathar_, Jul 15 2010]
Not multiplicative; for example a(2)*a(3) != a(6). - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 31 2012
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
xref: Cf. A008683, A157658 (same except for a(1)).
results.author: _Jaroslav Krizek_, Mar 03 2009
